name: ZillaRilla
description:
This is game-project made as part of the game-developers education at the University of Skövde.

ZillaRilla is an action-brawler game that can be summed up as follows: Aliens invade the world and Zilla and Rilla choose to work together and fight them, just because they want to be humanity’s biggest threat again.

If you have two controllers and a spare friend around  give this game a spin!
